c01171e1-cafd-4111-a47a-a93a0b1151d1.label: Description
c01171e1-cafd-4111-a47a-a93a0b1151d1.value: Sapelo Island is home to the Gullah/Geechee people, many of whom reside at Hog Hammock on the southern half of the island. The rest of Sapelo is state-owned and managed. Its ecosystem and long history of occupation make Sapelo a site of great ecological, archaeological, cultural, and historical significance.
